text: Sires of the Caribbean also known as Bad Girl Island is a 2007 Bahamian science fiction mystery movie directed by Stewart Raffill and starring AnnaLynne McCord, Antonio Sabato Jr., James Brolin, Ashley Loren. ==Other websites== * Category:2007 science fiction movies Category:2000s mystery movies Category:Bahamian movies Category:Movies directed by Stewart Raffill Category:Movies set in the Bahamas
title: Sirens of the Caribbean
